body: This is a discussion continuing from comments to the GH group page: Hi Chris. Thanks for your response, i used the attached gh file that you sent me and im trying to run the simulation but im getting the same "no ventilation will be assigned" result  [](http://api.ning.com/files/N3a4E7n0BnekN7XuSGscQHErGWtHjqFIp1LPlL5P7aBbsLCCg6ynatkv*UHdbQeLb19rcc03M*IpdhyYi72BEiN5jhnMJNJe/Captura.JPG) am i using the component the wrong way ?  thanks.
